title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Solarium Bar Plans", February 14, 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 537-3/1"=1'0"/BLOCK-/CHICAGO, E.W./ 2/14/36, 2/14/36, 2, 1-336 (?); inscribed in graphite, lower center: BAR FOR MR. L.S. BLOCK/BARRY APARTMENT/CHICAGO, ILL./ALL MEASUREMENTS TO BE VERIFIED ON JOB; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials.
description: Plan and elevations for bar in solarium of Block apartment. Bar along west wall with back bar against wall; reflector in top of back bar with glass shelves and glass brick wall behind, shelves below counter with sliding door panel. Icemaker and sink behind/underneath bar. Bar has white mahogany surface and white linoleum on front; indirect lighting underneath overhang of bar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Solarium Bar Plans", February 14, 1936.
February 14, 1936. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-577.
